text: ye ve paigambar hai jo allaah ke krpaapaatr hue, aadam kee santaan mein se aur un logon ke vanshaj mein se jinako hamane nooh ke saath savaar kiya, aur ibaraaheem aur isaraeel ke vanshaj mein se aur unamen se jinako hamane seedha maarg dikhaaya aur chun liya. jab unhen rahamaan kee aayaten sunaee jaateen to ve sajada karate aur rote hue gir padate the
